name: Hexapong (silent.individuals)
description:
Hexapong is a Hyper Casual Pong Dynamic Arena battle by Silent Individuals.

Be mad crazy and play a fast-paced, modern version of PONG, never seen before!

Play with up to 5 other players, and crush each other in intense battle arenas that shift and change to spice things up!

An official entry to GameJam Plus Manila - Philippines 2022, Hexapong falls under the Back to the Future and Try Together Themes of the event.

List and Credits of SFX's used

#beourplus1
